title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Deep Learning-Based Optimization of Wireless Communication System Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Calculate and interpret Block Error Rate (BLER) in a Rayleigh fading channel environment.
Explain signal transmission optimization methods applying RIS (Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface) and MRT (Maximum Ratio Transmission) beamforming principles.
Implement practical cases optimizing the number of distributed RIS components using deep learning models.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
